Join us this Thurs. to learn where candidates stand & what YOU can do to Vote Smart Justice.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

As you may have heard, the ACLU of Georgia recently kicked off our Vote Smart Justice Campaign. The Smart Justice Campaign is dedicated to ending mass incarceration and eliminating racial disparities in our state's criminal justice system.

Our goal is to educate all Georgians about the importance of considering criminal justice reform issues as you turn out at you cast your ballot this November.

But we're going beyond the website. We're bringing the education to you — right in your neighborhood, in the homes of your neighbors. That's what Community Conversations is all about — meeting real people, in their homes, and talking about Smart Justice in this election.

We'll be in your neighborhood, Atlanta, this Thursday for a Community Conversation about Smart Justice and how you can Vote Smart Justice in this yearâ€™s election! We hope you will join us.
